alert.note: Alert for LaMoure; Stutsman (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 20 at 4:59PM CDT until June 20 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: The National Weather Service in Bismarck has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern LaMoure County in southeastern North Dakota... Southeastern Stutsman County in southeastern North Dakota... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 458 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Marion, or 24 miles southwest of Valley City, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of eastern LaMoure and southeastern Stutsman Counties, including the following locations... Grand Rapids. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
